subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson, trying to become the first driver to win four consecutive Cup season championships, wrecked on the third lap of the Dickies 500, won by Kurt Busch.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson, trying to become the first driver to win four consecutive Cup season championships, wrecked on the third lap of the Dickies 500, won by Kurt Busch.
